title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7901.3 - Who may apply
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7901.3 - Who may apply

State Regulations

Any end-user seeking an assignment of fuel from the State
set-aside system to resolve a hardship or emergency requirement, and a
wholesale purchaser-reseller seeking an assignment to enable him to supply such
end-users may apply for an assignment under the State set-aside
system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7901.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
